job.title: Software Engineer, Web
job.description: Job Summary:  We are looking for a talented front-end engineer to join a team that creates large-scale, highly-performant web applications. This team transforms large, complex datasets into fast and responsive user interfaces used by millions of people.  As a Software Engineer for Web (Full Stack), you will help us push the boundaries of what is possible on the client. You'll work with a team of other developers alongside systems engineers, services engineers and project managers. You are highly proficient in JavaScript, HTML and CSS and appreciate the details that make a user experience exceptional. You demonstrate enthusiasm for new technologies, languages, frameworks, and platforms.  We believe we offer unique opportunities for any technologist, including: Responsibilities: Preferred Qualifications: Required Education 828150BR
